__e: And you can save her, but only if you do exactly What I ask you to do.
This whole time, I convinced myself I was the one saving her, but it was the other way around.
A party's in trouble, And I'm the only one that can save it, But your wife and unborn daughter need you here.
All those years, wasted, trying to save her through others though you know you never can.
Once, I wasn't able to save my own family, but I'd like to rescue you and your daughter.
Barry, I get that you're desperate to help and you want to be the hero and you want to save her yourself, but I think she has to have a part in it too.
All this time, I've been trying to save her from herself?
I only wish... that I could really save you, from what's to come.
Maybe you have a better shot at saving her than you did your mother.
